metadata.title: CVE-2024-22259 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Applications that use UriComponentsBuilder in Spring Framework to parse anexternally provided URL (e.g. through a query parameter) AND performvalidation checks on the host of the parsed URL may be vulnerable to a openredirect https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/601.html attack or to aSSRF attack if the URL is used after passing validation checks. This is thesame as CVE-2024-22243 https://spring.io/security/cve-2024-22243 , but withdifferent input.

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
